sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When a user select a time slot, the time is not available for others to select.</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group display_value="Hikon Professional Services" name="Hikon Professional Services">0ea124de4f6463007e72aa95d310c750</assignment_group> <category/> <company display_value="BrightStarr">c507ddfa4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c79b</company> <description>When the requestor choose the relevent time slot, a pending record will be created (to block, based on availability, this time / day) When the Deployment request is Scheduled, the record will be saved is "booked"</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 02:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp/> <notes/> <number>TAS0001144</number> <package display_value="PACK0001018">b395341f4f6027007e72aa95d310c7fc</package> <short_description>Book Time - Time booked</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-27 09:39:05</sys_created_on> <sys_id>46e023214f3c67007e72aa95d310c77e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>matt.parker@unily.com</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-01 11:28:02</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
